sentence: His bizarre behavior at the party raised many eyebrows.

definition: to find out or learn with certainty
sentence: The detective worked hard to ascertain the truth behind the mystery.
The inexorable march of time affects us all.
His fatuous comments during the meeting drew laughter from the audience.

definition: intended for or likely to be understood by only a small number of people
sentence: The lecture on quantum physics was filled with esoteric concepts.

definition: a complete or impressive collection of things
sentence: The museum's panoply of artifacts tells the story of ancient civilizations.
She had the temerity to challenge the professor's long-held beliefs.

definition: of or belonging to the time before the biblical Flood
sentence: His antediluvian ideas about technology seemed outdated.
The pulchritudinous scenery took her breath away.
His sesquipedalian speech left the audience confused.
